about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm Hilmar van der Veen, a senior frontend developer with over 10 years of experience building scalable, accessible and future-proof web applications.
body: I've worked on complex projects for governments, lottery organizations and large enterprises. My focus is on quality, scalability and user experience.
What sets me apart is that I don't just build – I lead. I take ownership, help teams grow, and think critically about technical and functional solutions.
Whether it's setting up a design system, migrating legacy code or building configuration-driven UI tools – I deliver structured, tested and documented results.
